lines.text: Do you want to try it, Pokey?
No thanks, I prefer grass.
Oh no. Not me.
Huh?
I've had enough piano moving. Besides, I can't even read music.
We've been framed. Never trust animated people.

[Gumby caught a baseball in his belly]
Good work, Gumby. That's using the ol' stomach.

[In an oven, Gumby is spotted]
I say, Rolly, look at that green chap. Wouldn't he make great jelly filling? Ha ha ha.
Yeah, let's get him.
What does that do to the dough?
It kneads it.
It needs what?
It kneads the dough.
The dough needs the dough?

[Dough looks to Gumby helplessly]
Pokey, he means the machine KNEADS the dough.
Oh.

[after he and his friends enjoy lemonade]
How about another round, waiter?
Certainly, Sir. That'll be .40¢ more.
Huh? But your sign says, "All you can drink for .10¢."
Well that's ALL you CAN drink for .10¢.
When I give the signal, run and get in that jeep.
What if the soldiers see us?
Don't worry, we can beat them to the book in that. Ready? Go!
[they run over to Gumby's jeep; the soldiers fire on them; Gumby starts it in his second attempt and they drive off]
They'll never catch us now. Paul Revere, here we come!
Gumby, look out!
[a cannon sitting in front of them fires]
